title: pOr puri pOr puri
sahitya:
pOr puri pOr puri vIra manidanE poyyiruL accam ozhindiDavE


anupallavi

  pArai azhikkum manap-paghai pAzh paDap-parishuddha shaktiyAl bhakti vairAgyattAl


caraNam    Attiram koNDa sinattai asUyaiyai AyuLait-tinnum aghandaiyinai
tIttaNal pOl varum nAttika surattai dhIrattinAl jnAnat-tiNmaiyinAl vellap-
